description: If the tasks have already completed, a "Generated Intent" block for the query is displayed. How it works: for the query, we have a set of Expected Results — meaning these are presumed relevant documents, products, or pages for the query. Their content helps to understand what the user meant in their query. For example, if a brand name appears there, the system will recognize it as a brand, not as a descriptive word. Now, let’s click on the query to get all runs.
